alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 03 at 9:25PM CST until February 05 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Big Nance Creek at Courtland affecting Lawrence County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big Nance Creek at Courtland. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins on the left bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Thursday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.6 feet on 01/18/2006. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 930 AM CST.
